listings.Description of job/activites: Responsible for providing advisory services to clients in the aviation and aerospace sectors, focusing on commercial, financial, and technical disciplines.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Experience in aviation consultancy or related fields, strong analytical skills, effective communication, and a passion for the aviation industry.

listings.Description of job/activites: Conduct market research, perform financial modeling, and assist in developing strategic recommendations for clients.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Bachelor's degree in finance, economics, or related field; experience in data analysis and proficiency in Excel.

listings.Description of job/activites: Lead projects from inception to completion, ensuring deliverables meet client expectations and timelines.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Proven project management experience, excellent organizational skills, and a background in aviation or consulting.
